snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin condemned the renewed military effort, saying that he would move aggressively to protect the interests of Russians abroad.
abstract: Ukrainian government is urged by Russia, in stern warning, to reinstate cease-fire and halt military operation intended to suppress the pro-Russian separatist insurrection; seeking to calm the situation and put peace negotiations back on track, foreign ministers of Ukraine, Russia, France and Germany meet in Berlin but seem to make little progress.

byline.contributor: Nikolay Khalip contributed reporting from Moscow, and Alison Smale from Berlin.

lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin condemned the renewed military effort, saying that he would move aggressively to protect the interests of Russians abroad.

headline.main: Russia Demands New Cease-Fire in Ukraine as Foreign Ministers Seek Path to Peace
headline.print_headline: Russia Demands New Cease-Fire in Ukraine as Foreign Ministers Seek Path to Peace
